solution_line_template: First find the total number of zits in Mr. Jones' class: {jones_avg_zits} zits/kid * {jones_num_kids} kids = <<{jones_avg_zits}*{jones_num_kids}={total_zits_jones_class}>>{total_zits_jones_class} zits

Then find the total number of zits in Ms. Swanson's class: {swanson_avg_zits} zits/kid * {swanson_num_kids} kids = <<{swanson_avg_zits}*{swanson_num_kids}={total_zits_swanson_class}>>{total_zits_swanson_class} zits

Then subtract the number of zits in Ms. Swanson's class from the number in Mr. Jones' class to find the difference: {total_zits_jones_class} zits - {total_zits_swanson_class} zits = <<{total_zits_jones_class}-{total_zits_swanson_class}={difference_in_zits}>>{difference_in_zits} zits
